p: The experiment lasted for 14 days; both Cd and essential oil were administered daily. Essential oil was prepared in DMSO (0.3%) and administered orally 30 min before Cd injection. After the last day of treatment (14 th day), animals were fasted overnight and euthanized according to the approved protocol. The whole brains as well as prefrontal cortex and hippocampus were isolated and homogenized in 100 mM potassium phosphate, pH 7.5. The homogenates were centrifuged at 14,000 × g for 10 min at 4°C, and the supernatant was used for the subsequent enzymatic assays.
